title: Processing the trauma of sexual abuse and leading a life of hope and healing
body: According to the Rape, Abuse and Incest National Network (RAINN), someone is sexually assaulted every 73 seconds in America -- and every 9 minutes, that victim is a child. As disturbing as that statistic is – just as alarming is that only 5 out of every 1,000 perpetrators ends up in prison. April is Sexual Assault Awareness Month and Shari Alyse, survivor and author of “,” shared advice on healing and processing trauma. Sexual Assault Hotline: 1-800-656-4673Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network:
